Name.BusinessNameLine1: CHILD AND FAMILY SERVICES OF ERIE COUNTY

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: PROGRAMS TO STRENGTHEN, SUPPORT, AND ENRICH FAMILY LIFE THROUGH PREVENTION, INTERVENTION, EDUCATION, AND ADVOCACY.
IRS990.MissionDescription: CHILD AND FAMILY SERVICES OF ERIE COUNTY STRENGTHENS FAMILIES AND PROMOTES THE WELL BEING OF CHILDREN THROUGH PREVENTION, EDUCATION, AND ADVOCACY.
IRS990.Description: RESIDENTIAL TREATMENT: TO PROVIDE RESIDENTIAL TREATMENT AND OTHER SERVICES TO EMOTIONALLY DISTURBED CHILDREN AND THEIR FAMILIES.

Activity2.Description: CHILDREN SERVICES: PROVIDES SERVICES TO CHILDREN AND THEIR FAMILIES TO PROMOTE THEIR PHYSICAL AND MENTAL WELL-BEING.

Activity3.Description: CLINICAL SERVICES: SERVICES PROVIDED TO CHILDREN AND THEIR FAMILIES INCLUDE EVALUATIONS, TREATMENT, CRISIS INTERVENTION, AND MEDICAL ASSISTANCE.

ActivityOther.Description: PROGRAM SERVICES THAT SUPPORT AND PROMOTE HEALTHY RELATIONSHIPS BETWEEN CHILDREN AND THEIR FAMILIES.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: FORM 990, SCHEDULE D, PART XI, LINE 8. THE AGENCY ENTERED INTO A INTEREST RATE SWAP AGREEMENT TO ELIMINATE RISKS ASSOCIATED WITH THE VARIABILITY OF FUTURE EARNINGS AND CASH FLOWS CAUSED BY MOVEMENTS IN DEBT INTEREST RATES. THE ARRANGEMENTS ARE MEASURED AT FAIR VALUE AND ADJUSTED ANNUALLY.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: Procedure for Monitoring Grants in the U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Schedule I, Part I, Line 2: CLIENTS (FOSTER CHILDREN) ARE REFERRED TO C&FS BY ERIE COUNTY DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL SERVICES. C&FS CHILD CARE WORKERS FORWARD INTAKE/DISCHARGE SLIPS TO ACCOUNTING. ACCOUNTING THEN PROCESSES FOSTERPARENTS PAYROLL ON THE 15TH OF THE MONTH BASED ON CLIENTS AGE AND CLASSIFICATION.

Form990ScheduleLPartIV.Relationship: PRESIDENT OF PARKVIEW HEALTH AND BOARD MEMBER OF THE ORGANIZATION.
Form990ScheduleLPartIV.DescriptionOfTransaction: THE AGENCY PURCHASES PHARMACEUTICAL SUPPLIES FROM PARKVIEW HEALTH.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: CHILD AND FAMILY SERVICES OF ERIE COUNTY FEDERAL AND STATE INFORMATIONAL RETURNS ARE REVIEWED BY A DESIGNATED BOARD COMMITTEE (AUDIT COMMITTEE) AND THE FULL BOARD RECIEVES COPIES OF THE DRAFT 990 PRIOR TO BEING FILED.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: CHILD AND FAMILY SERVICES OF ERIE COUNTY (C&FS) HAS A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY FOR DIRECTORS AND OFFICERS. IN ADDITION, C&FS HAS A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY THAT COVERS ALL EMPLOYEES. THE AGENCY'S CORPORATE COMPLIANCE OFFICER DETERMINES WHETHER A CONFLICT EXISTS AND REVIEWS THE CONFLICT IN COLLABORATION WITH THE AGENCY'S LEADERSHIP TEAM, CEO AND/OR BOARD AS APPLICABLE. DEPENDING ON THE CONFLICT, THE POLICY MAY REQUIRE THE BOARD MEMBER OR EMPLOYEE TO REMOVE THEMSELVES FROM THE TRANSACTION. THE AGENCY IS CURRENTLY EVALUATING WHICH "KEY" EMPLOYEES WILL BE REQUIRED TO PROVIDE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE ON AN ANNUAL BASIS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE AGENCY'S EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE (EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE) REVIEWS THE PROPOSED COMPENSATION FOR THE CEO, OFFICERS, AND KEY EMPLOYEES. A COMPARABILITY STUDY UTILIZING LOCAL AND NATIONAL DATA IS USED IN DETERMINING APPROPRIATE COMPENSATION. APPROVAL OF COMPENSATION FOR THE CEO, OFFICERS, AND KEY EMPLOYEES IS DOCUMENTED IN THE MINUTES OF THE EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE MEETING.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: A SUMMARIZED VERSION OF CHILD AND FAMILY SERVICES FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE IN THEIR ANNUAL REPORT. THE AGENCY'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE NOT ROUTINELY AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.

THE PROCESS FOR SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT AND ASSUMPTION OF RESPONSIBILITY FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE WORK PERFORMED HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR. THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS APPROVES THE SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT AND THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS PREPARED BY THEM EACH FISCAL YEAR.

Form990ScheduleRPartII.PrimaryActivities: PROVIDE K -12 EDUCATIONAL SERVICES TO STUDENTS WITH LEARNING NEEDS.

DirectControllingEntityName.BusinessNameLine1: CHILD AND FAMILY SERVICES OF ERIE COUNTY

Form990ScheduleRPartII.PrimaryActivities: PROVIDE SUPPORT FOR THE BENEFIT OF CHILD AND FAMILY SERVICES OF ERIE COUNTY

DirectControllingEntityName.BusinessNameLine1: CHILD AND FAMILY SERVICES OF ERIE COUNTY
